name.value: Visit the Github repository for more information

description.value: An element that can evolve over time. All Changeable elements must have identity.

definition.value: An element that can evolve over time. All Changeable elements must have identity.

short.value: an indicator that states whether the Changeable element is ACTIVE, and subject to searching and browsing access or INACTIVE, meaning that it is only accessible if its identity is already known or if the service calls specifically state that they want to see inactive service elements

definition.value: an indicator that states whether the Changeable element is ACTIVE, and subject to searching and browsing access or INACTIVE, meaning that it is only accessible if its identity is already known or if the service calls specifically state that they want to see inactive service elements
